archimate:ServiceJourney.name: Channel Specific Service Journey
archimate:ServiceJourney.documentation: A Channel Specific Service Journey is used to document the journey elements required to deliver the service (or aspect of the service) through a specific channel. This will include journey elements that are only required because of the capabilities / limitations of the channel in question. Through including the costs, time and resources needed for each interaction we can compare the different delivery channels to assess which most effectively meets the goals of the service.
